original_text: I was advancing in Judaism beyond many of my own age among my people and was extremely zealous for the traditions of my fathers.
korean_text: 내가 내 동족 중 여러 연갑자보다 유대교를 지나치게 믿어 내 조상의 전통에 대하여 더욱 열심이 있었으나

sentences.original_text: beyond many of my own age
sentences.korean_translation: 나와 같은 또래의 많은 사람들보다 앞서

sentences.original_text: for the traditions of my fathers
